# catalystcenter_global_credential_netconf (Resource)

This resource manages a global NETCONF credential.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "catalystcenter_global_credential_netconf" "example" {
  netconf_port    = "830"
  comments        = "My NETCONF Credential"
  credential_type = "GLOBAL"
  description     = "NETCONF credential for network devices"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `comments` (String) Comments to identify the netconf credential
- `netconf_port` (String) Netconf port on the device. Valid port should be in the range of 1 to 65535.

### Optional

- `credential_type` (String) Credential type to identify the application that uses the netconf credential
  - Choices: `GLOBAL`, `APP`
- `description` (String) Description for Netconf Credentials

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The id of the object

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import catalystcenter_global_credential_netconf.example "<id>"
```
